Articles.Content:
Find an easier way to land on Tylo...by creating a indestructible lander!

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Rules:

1. You must use a ascent stage capable of returning from Tylo's surface to Tylo's Orbit. (preferably extremely small)

2. Make that ascent stage indestructible using any means necessary. (test it using the Parachuteless Return challenge)

3. You may not use fuel during descent.

4. Using cheats of any kind is not tolerated except in the event of the Kraken / other glitch.

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Good luck, sucker, and make us all a way to make our lives easier by saving fuel on Tylo! Get Going!

Clearly impossible End of sentence.

Unless its a atmospheric body.

Edited April 22, 2014 by Dooz

Use this mod: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/hooligan-labs-airship-parts-and-plugin/ to go to the "surface" of JOOL and return to Jool orbit.

It's THAT simple. I Don't care how you do it, just:

1. No cheating.

2. Use the mod, otherwise you will NOT succeed.

3. Go to extreme lengths to get the mod so you can make history.

Begin!
Do the same as "Parachuteless landing", exept on Eve.

Hello super. While we encourage people to post challenges for the enjoyment of other players, there are a few rules to follow. For one thing, the challenge needs to be possible, which I don't believe a couple of these are, and also, there's an expectation that you have done it at least once yourself, which I suspect isn't the case. Please don't be discouraged, but do put a bit more forethought into a challenge before posting another one.
